mapper.select: SELECT PURCHASE.PURCHASE_DATE, PURCHASE.RM_NO, RAW_MATERIAL.RM_NAME, PURCHASE.VENDOR_NO, VENDOR.VENDOR_NAME, PURCHASE.PURCHASE_AMOUNT FROM PURCHASE LEFT JOIN VENDOR ON PURCHASE.VENDOR_NO = VENDOR.VENDOR_NO LEFT JOIN RAW_MATERIAL ON PURCHASE.RM_NO = RAW_MATERIAL.RM_NO
SELECT * FROM PURCHASE ORDER BY PURCHASE_DATE DESC
